attributes.action: Make gyms covid safe so they don't have to shut for anther lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Children and adult mental health and well being will plummet if they are locked down again with no outlet. The gym is a family, a community to support each other and familiar to those with additional needs. This gym is part of my sons education and many rely on their gym time to maintain health and routine. If done safely let's keep the gym open.
attributes.background: There is no evidence to suggest a gym is a hot spot for covid, make them covid secure so they can stay open. Support smaller gyms like ludus magnus gym who do great work for many people.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
